question: President Miguel Diaz Canel is reintroduce the post of Prime Minister in his country after more than 4 decades. What country is he the president of?
explanation: The Cuba government is to get the office of Prime Minister after more than 40 years. The last Prime Minister of the Central American country was Fidel Castro who abolished the post after becoming the president. The Cuban Prime Minister is to be the head of the government with a 5 year term.
